problem.markdown:
Which of the following are true?
[x] For a general system, the work done is not an exact differential. [x] We can determine the work done by integration of [mathjaxinline]dW[/mathjaxinline] only if the process is a quasi-static process. [x] The total work done by a system can be written as a sum of all the individual components of work (that is, the sum of electric work, expansion work, etc.)
problem.p: Which of the following are true?

checkboxgroup.choice: For a general system, the work done is not an exact differential.
We can determine the work done by integration of [mathjaxinline]dW[/mathjaxinline] only if the process is a quasi-static process.
